name: Tower Rush (Trident19)
description:
Tower Rush is a 2d action-adventure game where you control a brave knight who wants to save his people from the cursed monsters and be the new king.

You can upgrade your stats with golds you gain from killing enemies. There are interactive objects along the way. You will face different enemies during your journey and one boss fight at the end. 

This game is made with the Godot Game Engine

Controls: Keyboard only

Available for: Windows
